  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3554</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3554</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Les notes de l'espai</string>
            <string language="en">The notes in the spaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anmerkungen in den Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les notes dans les espaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As notas nos espaços</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le note negli spazi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σημειώσεις στα διαστήματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Mini unitat didàctica (MUD) que presenta exercicis i jocs per tal de memoritzar els sons situats als espais del pentagrama. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació (Avalua't) i de pràctica (Practica).</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) with exercises and games to help memorize the sounds of the notes between the lines of the musical staff. It includes self-assessment and practice activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">audició musical</string>
            <string language="en">music listening</string>
            <string language="es">audición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) mit den 
Übungen und Spielen zum zu helfen, die Töne der Anmerkungen zwischen
den Zeilen des musikalischen Personals sich zu merken. Er 
schließt Selbstbewertung und Praxisaktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) avec des 
exercices et des jeux à aider à apprendre par coeur les bruits des 
notes entre les lignes du personnel musical. Elle inclut 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment et activités de pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) com os exercícios e
os jogos a ajudar memorizar os sons das notas entre as linhas da 
equipe de funcionários musical. Inclui atividades do 
self-assessment e da prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) con le 
esercitazioni ed i giochi da contribuire a memorizzare i suoni delle 
note fra le righe del personale musicale. Include le attività 
di pratica e di valutazione di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) με τις ασκήσεις και τα
παιχνίδια για να βοηθήσει να απομνημονεύσει τους ήχους των 
σημειώσεων μεταξύ των γραμμών του μουσικού προσωπικού. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης και 
πρακτικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikhören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
